title: $TRUMP Token Launch: Real-Time Presidential Bribery Infrastructure (Jan 20, 2025)
description: Document the unprecedented launch of $TRUMP and $MELANIA tokens on Inauguration Day 2025, creating the first real-time presidential influence market in history. Focus on the timing, scale, and immediate foreign participation.
research_areas: What was the exact timeline of $TRUMP token launch relative to Trump's oath of office?
Who were the major early purchasers in the first 24 hours?
How did foreign governments respond to the token launch?
What technical infrastructure enabled the simultaneous launch with inauguration?
How did token prices correlate with early policy announcements?
source_requirements: Token launch records, blockchain transaction data, platform technical specifications, foreign exchange patterns
pdf_source: The Capture Cascade - Part 5_ The Breakthrough.pdf
